pic1_alt: Table of taxonomy of eggs by product type and production process. Product types are Table Egg (shell and processed (liquid, frozen, powdered)) and Hatching. Production processes are Non-organic (caged and cage-free) and organic (cage free). Hatching only has hatching production process. Table egg - processed has Caged Non-Organic Table Processed, Cage-Free Non-Organic Table Processed, Cage-Free Organic Table Processed. Table Egg - Shell has Caged Non-Organic Table Shell, Cage-Free Non-Organic Table Shell, Cage-Free Organic Table Shell.
pic2_alt: A trend line of percentage of henes in cage-free housing from December 2007 to February 2021. From 2008 to 2011 the percentage was under 5%. From 2012 to 2015 the percentage was about 6%. In 2016 the percentage increased to 8% and has increased since then. In 2016 there are data points for months as well as years. This gives some more variability to the data, so the linear increase has some small dips and troughs to it. By 2021 the percentage is 29%. Data are available at https://osf.io/z2gxn/.
